name: Jfrog Artifactory
description: This dashboard provides an overview of usage statistics of JFrog Artifactory logs (Application, Audit, Docker, Requests) and overview of the System metrics, JVM statistics, Storage consumption, Garbage collection, and other operational insights associated with JFrog Artifactory

rawConfiguration.text:
![JFrog Artifactory Logo](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

---
#### Dashboard Instructions

(Scroll for more)

---
##### Variables Available
* **User**: Filters by user, primarily for auditing actions
* **IP Address**: Filters by IP Address, also for audit actions
* **Repo**: Filters by repository, used for monitoring docker data
---
##### Dashboard Pages
- **Overview**: A snapshot of your artifactory services
- **System**: Track the performance of your artifactory service
- **Application**: Track Log Volume and Artifactory Errors over time
- **Audit**: Track audit logs to determine who is accessing your Artifactory instance and from where | *Variables: User, IP Address*
- **Docker**: Tracks your dockerhub status over time | *Variables: Repo*
- **Database**: Tracks your database connections
- **Requests**: Tracks HTTP response codes, and upload/download activity by IP Address

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_used_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_free_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_used_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Disk space used'
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.sys_cpu_ratio) * 100 as 'CPU %'

FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_free_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_used_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_used_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Memory used' SINCE 30 minutes ago
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE log_level = 'ERROR') AS 'Error rate' FROM Log WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.service'

FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_totalmemory_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_freememory_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_totalmemory_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Heap memory used' SINCE 30 minutes ago
SELECT count(log_source) FROM Log FACET log_source WHERE log_source LIKE 'jfrog.rt%'

SELECT sum(request_content_length) as 'sum' FROM Log FACET repo WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND request_url LIKE '/api/docker/%' AND image != 'NULL' AND repo IN ({{repo}}) AND image != ''

SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET CASES(WHERE numeric(return_status) < 400 AND numeric(return_status) > 299 as '3xx responses',WHERE numeric(return_status) < 500 AND numeric(return_status) > 399 as '4xx responses',WHERE numeric(return_status) < 600 AND numeric(return_status) > 499 as '5xx responses') WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request'

widgets.title: Real time error logs (Click logs for details)

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM Log WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.service' AND log_level = 'ERROR' LIMIT 100
FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_used_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_free_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_used_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Disk space used'
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.sys_cpu_ratio) * 100 as 'CPU %'

FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_free_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_used_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_used_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Memory used' SINCE 30 minutes ago

FROM Metric SELECT percentage(sum(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_totalmemory_bytes) + sum(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_freememory_bytes), WHERE jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_totalmemory_bytes IS NOT NULL) as 'Heap memory used' SINCE 30 minutes ago
FROM Metric SELECT latest(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_processors_total) as 'Processors' SINCE 7 days ago

FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_free_bytes) as 'Disk Free(GB)', average(jfrog.artifactory.app_disk_used_bytes) as 'Disk Used(GB)', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_storage_current_total_size_bytes) as 'Disk Total(GB)' TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.sys_cpu_ratio)*100 as 'CPU %' TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_used_bytes) as 'Sys Used(GB)', average(jfrog.artifactory.sys_memory_free_bytes) as 'Sys Free(GB)' TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_processors_total) as 'No. of Processors', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_freememory_bytes) as 'Heap Free(GB)', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_maxmemory_bytes) as 'Heap Max(GB)', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_runtime_heap_totalmemory_bytes) as 'Heap Used(GB)' TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_artifacts_gc_binaries_total) as 'GC Cleaned(Binaries)' TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_artifacts_gc_size_cleaned_bytes) / 1000000 as 'GC Cleaned(GB)' TIMESERIES
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE log_level= 'ERROR') as 'Error rate' FROM Log WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.service'
SELECT count(*) FROM Log WHERE log_source LIKE 'jfrog.rt%' OR log_source LIKE 'jfrog.artifactory%' COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT count(*) as 'errors' FROM Log WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.service' AND log_level ='ERROR' COMPARE WITH 1 week ago
SELECT count(log_source) FROM Log FACET log_source TIMESERIES AUTO WHERE log_source != 'jfrog.xray.*' AND log_source != 'NULL'
SELECT count(*) FROM Log WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.service' AND log_level ='ERROR' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_http_connections_max_total) as 'Maximum', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_http_connections_leased_total) as 'Leased', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_http_connections_pending_total) as 'Pending', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_http_connections_available_total) as 'Available' TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET user WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.access.audit' AND user IN ({{user}})
SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET username WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.access' AND username IN ({{user}}) AND ip IN ({{ip}}) AND action_response LIKE 'DENIED%'
SELECT count(ip) as 'IP address' FROM Log FACET ip WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.access' AND action_response LIKE 'DENIED%' AND username IN ({{user}}) AND ip IN ({{ip}})
SELECT count(*) from Log FACET username WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.access' and action_response = 'DENIED LOGIN' and username IN ({{user}}) AND ip IN ({{ip}})
SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET ip  WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.access' and action_response ='DENIED LOGIN' AND ip IN ({{ip}}) AND username IN ({{user}})
SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET username WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.access' and action_response ='ACCEPTED DEPLOY' AND username IN ({{user}}) AND ip IN ({{ip}})

SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET image WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND repo !='NULL' AND image!='NULL' AND repo IN ({{repo}}) AND image !='' and repo !='latest' AND request_url LIKE '/api/docker/%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT sum(request_content_length) as 'sum' FROM Log FACET repo WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND request_url LIKE '/api/docker/%' AND repo IN ({{repo}}) AND image!='NULL' AND image!=''

SELECT sum(response_content_length) as 'sum' FROM Log FACET repo WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND request_url LIKE '/api/docker/%' AND repo IN ({{repo}}) AND image!='NULL'  AND image!=''

SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET repo WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND image!='NULL' AND repo IN ({{repo}}) AND image !='' and repo !='latest' AND request_url LIKE '/api/docker/%' TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_active_total) / latest(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_max_active_total) * 100 as '%' SINCE 7 days ago
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_active_total) as 'Connections'
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_max_active_total) as 'Connections'
FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_idle_total) as 'Connections'

FROM Metric SELECT average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_max_active_total) as 'Active(Max)', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_min_idle_total) as 'Idle(Min)', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_idle_total) as 'Idle', average(jfrog.artifactory.jfrt_db_connections_active_total) as 'Active' TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) as 'errors' FROM Log WHERE log_source ='jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND return_status LIKE '5%%' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT sum(request_content_length) as 'upload size' FROM Log FACET remote_address WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND request_content_length != '-1' limit 10
SELECT sum(response_content_length) as 'upload size' FROM Log FACET remote_address WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' AND response_content_length != '-1'  limit 10
SELECT count(*) FROM Log FACET return_status WHERE log_source = 'jfrog.rt.artifactory.request' TIMESERIES AUTO

nrqlQuery.query: SELECT uniques(username) FROM Log WHERE log_source LIKE 'jfrog.rt.artifactory%' AND username NOT LIKE 'token:%' SINCE 7 days ago
SELECT uniques(ip) FROM Log WHERE log_source LIKE 'jfrog.rt%' AND ip NOT LIKE '%token%' SINCE 7 days ago
SELECT uniques(repo) FROM Log WHERE log_source LIKE 'jfrog.rt%' SINCE 7 days ago
